definitions: To give a name to someone or something.
To identify or specify by name.
To mention or refer to by name.
To appoint to a position or office.
To decide on or set (a date, price, etc.).
examples: They will name the baby next week.
Can you name all the capitals?
He was named as a suspect.
She was named to the board.
We need to name a date for the meeting.
